job_title: Director Of Brand Partnerships - 1st Party Data - Apparel/Footwear
job_description:
One of our clients is looking for a Director of Brand Partnerships to join their team. The Director of Brand Partnerships will work closely with the CEO and COO to expand the company's outreach and partnerships across the apparel brand ecosystem. The ideal candidate is a self-starter capable of being both a strategic sales development professional and a world-class individual contributor.

Preferably, they would like someone that is anywhere East in the Mississippi.

Responsibilities

You will create and own their Channel strategy and execution for partnering with apparel and fashion brands, educating the market about the company's product offerings and value proposition. Responsibilities will include:
• Leveraging an existing network of data-driven marketing and programmatic decision-makers in apparel and fashion wholesalers and retailers in order to grow revenue for the company.
• Driving awareness and sell through of their data products and offerings through effective prospecting, partner qualification, and deal negotiations.
• Developing and maintaining a pipeline forecast including meeting quarterly, and establishing and achieving annual sales goals.
• Representing the company at co-marketing events, including webinars, seminars, and trade shows.
• Building an actionable account plan and maintaining CRM records on their strategic accounts.
• Delivering capabilities presentations and product demonstrations virtually and in person.
• Teaming-up with the company marketing to develop marketing programs designed to win mindshare.
• Collaborating with the product team to provide feedback to help evolve the product portfolio.
• Collaborating with other members of the team to define and execute sales strategies and tactics to increase new revenue.

Qualifications
• You enjoy the pace and change of a start-up.
• You enjoy working independently but also work well on teams.
• You’re creative and innovative.
• Customers return your call because they enjoy working with you.

Requirements
• 8 to 10 years of full cycle sales experience (w/data products, SaaS software, combo)
• An established network of VP and Director level digital marketing contacts in the Retail and wholesale industry.
• Firm grasp of the digital marketing and programmatic advertising solutions marketplace and top tier technology platform players.
• Successful sales track record demonstrating quota achievement
• Excellent communication and presentation skillsets
• Strong references
